content:
I deactivated my account because I thought I wouldn't have time to work on things like prioritizing at first, but then found out that I could devote some time to them, so I want to be active again!
According to the zulip docs, only admins can manage the accounts. Could someone re-activate my previous account ( @Yuki Okushi|217081 )?
oh, seems we cannot mention deactivated accounts here :/
